channel.title: How i do compiile
channel.description: i make a server but i try to comkpile and i find compile but no compile.bat can anyonee tell me how i do compile bat?

item.title: How i do compiile
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“TimeWarp, post:6, topic:241410”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=317753.msg2520528#msg2520528 date=1225847877]

i make a server but i try to comkpile and i find compile but no compile.bat can anyonee tell me how i do compile bat?

Use javac you can find it in your jdk folder. most people use BACH to activate and compile everything.
[/quote]
Its "Batch"Not BACH…
“Windows Batch File”[/quote]

No shit, ever heard of a typo?

Read full topic

item.title: How i do compiile

item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

~IMxoxoxIM~:

i make a server but i try to comkpile and i find compile but no compile.bat can anyonee tell me how i do compile bat?

Use javac you can find it in your jdk folder. most people use BACH to activate and compile everything.

item.title: How i do compiile
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

If you can’t compile, then don’t program in Java.

I’ll post my awesome compiler later :P. You type a letter in, it compiles, runs, or restarts your server for you.

To make a compile Batch file, you simply save “compile.bat” in command prompt.

Read full topic

item.title: How i do compiile
item.dc:creator: @TimeWarp TimeWarp
item.description:
@TimeWarp wrote:

@echo off
Title (Server name) Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Make a windows Batch file and put that in it

Read full topic
